metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000040 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple use of uninitialized value bugs inthe PDF parser could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service (crash)or influence program flow via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mupdf package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
